works.description:
Amir Chand Patel, a former BSP leader who earlier was arrested on March 7th, 2010 on charges of raping a woman in 2009 has yet again been arrested.

This time he is said to be involved in a land grabbing and also a cheating case in Sarnath near Varnasi. An FIR of cheating has been filed against this expelled BSP leader Amir Chand Patel but a person named Krishnakant Mishra. Based on the complaint made, the police investigated and found Amir Chand Patel guilty. He has now been arrested.

Apart from this case, there are a dozen other cases pending against him.
